Title: Four Arrows
Writer: Craig Johnson (based upon the "Walt Longmire Mysteries" book series by), Hunt Baldwin (developed for television by), John Coveny (developed for television by), Sheri Holman
Actors: Robert Taylor, Katee Sackhoff, Lou Diamond Phillips, Cassidy Freeman
Plot: Walt moves on after a standoff with Barlow. A tourist is found dead in a luggage bag left behind a tour bus heading to the casino, causing more tension between Walt and Nighthorse. Henry looks to help an abused mother and her son.
